name: progressive-explore
description: Explore Progressive dashboard to find exact element selectors for ID card download

steps.description: CAPTURE: Dashboard snapshot - look for ID card/insurance card links
Wait 5 minutes - manually click ID card link and note the URL/page that opens
CAPTURE: ID card page snapshot - look for download/print buttons and their exact selectors

notes: This is a helper workflow to explore and capture exact element selectors
Use the snapshots to find exact element refs, IDs, names, and aria-labels
Then update progressive-id-card.json with the exact selectors
